system.has_solar: System Profile Toggles (what hardware do you have?)
charging_strategy: Charging Strategy (when to charge from grid)
strategic_charging: Strategic Charging (NOT FULLY IMPLEMENTED - see backlog) When prices drop below threshold, charge battery up to target regardless of other logic
export: Export Configuration [PLACEHOLDER] Most export logic not yet implemented - see backlog
grid: Grid Limits (Soft Constraint) This is a SOFT limit with penalty - planner prefers to stay under but can breach if needed. See system.grid.max_power_kw for the HARD limit (cannot be exceeded).
input_sensors: Input Sensors (entities Darkstar READS from Home Assistant)
input_sensors.today_grid_import: Daily sensors for Dashboard "Today's Stats" card
executor: Executor (control loop that WRITES to Home Assistant)
executor.automation_toggle_entity: Toggle entities (read by executor to check if enabled)
executor.inverter: Inverter Control Entities (executor WRITES to these)
executor.water_heater: Water Heater Control The executor controls your water heater by setting a target temperature. These temps define the operating modes:
appliances: Appliances (for manual scheduling UI) Define appliances that can be scheduled in the Planning tab
